message.raw:
Getting ready to have multi-tab editing.  Not much to do:

1. Currently edited file will not longer be current labscript file.
2. Each tab will contain it's own SimpleEditor widget, which will be expanded
to contain file information as well, so it can load-save on it's own.  The global
load-save will pull from the currently visible tab.

message:
Getting ready to have multi-tab editing.  Not much to do:
